projects.title: StudentCards Web Application
projects.description: Collaborative flashcard web app developed in a team of three. Features interactive games, flashcard creation, and full CRUD.

projects.title: Water Quality Analysis
projects.description: Evaluate water potability using binary classification methods to compare machine learning models' effectiveness in predicting safe drinking water.

projects.title: Music Player App
projects.description: Interactive music player with playlist management and audio controls built using React.

projects.title: Taylor Swift Song Ranking
projects.description: Data analysis of radio hit potential using ranking methods. Identified features influencing popularity.
